modName: Space Wiking Archpsijic Robe - Archmage Enchantment
summary: Adds a smithable and disenchantable psiijic robe with the Archmage Robe enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Dovahkiins 

Every mage in Skyrim wants the Archmage Robe, but not everyone like the look of it. So I decide to create a small mod what allows you to craft a disenchantable Archpsijic Robe. So you can enchant your own Archmage robe or armor. The classic Archmage Robe has the enchantment Skein of Magnus which is not dis/enchantable but my new Archmage Enchantment is. 

To craft the robe you need to finish the quest Eye of Magnus (the Archmage robe Quest) and get 1 linen pile, 2 leather strips and 1 filled grand soul gem, you can find the robe at any forge in the Misc section. When enchanting, The Archmage Enchantment will have always the same stats. 

Wish much fun and greetings from Slovakia :D 

Tom (Space Wiking)
author: SpaceWiking
